JESSE SHERWOOD JESSE SHERWOOD JESSE SHERWOOD JESSE SHERWOOD JESSE SHERWOOD

Jesse Sherwood is a writer from Western New York. He has made some things, and will likely make many more. He lives in New York City.

WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK WORK

Fiction

All Happy Families

He would never sit around waiting for someone to die, but his three daughters find themselves doing just that, waiting at his deathbed, trying to make sense of his past and their future.

Review

Kafka's Selfies

A new collection highlights Kafka's Kardashian-esque self-reflection.

Humor

Translations of Common Job Descriptions

"Minimum of 2 years of experience in a similar role” Ideally, you will have at least 45 years’ experience in this exact role. Though, we do want you to be fresh, hip, innovative."

Screenplay

The Woman With No Name

Violence and mayhem ensue after a nameless drifter finds herself facing off against three drug-smuggling brothers whose strip club dominates an oil boomtown turned bust-town in North Dakota.
